attributes.action: Overseas Students Creates a 'GAP' in the UK Education System
attributes.additional_details:
Higher Education in the UK is ‘Every Overseas Student Dream’ Said the Founder of Overseas Students Development Centre (OSDC). The UK is one of the most favorable destination for students seeking higher education worldwide. However, the question that should be asked – Whether overseas students are qualified candidates and are able to survive through the UK education challenges ?

Check out our blog to tackle this problem http://modelanswers87.wordpress.com
